summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces substantial new marketplace backend and frontend functionality despite no requested changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented marketplace/e-commerce backend canister functionality (listings, seller/user profiles, access control, storage mixins) without any stated requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Requirements: none; these backend features are newly introduced/modified without a corresponding request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified frontend marketplace UI (home page hero/search/category filtering, listing detail page with contact seller/share/copy actions, profile and sell flows referenced in summaries) without any stated requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requested features were specified in the BuildRequest, but multiple UI pages and behaviors are implemented/changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced image upload handling and listing form enhancements (template selector, data URL storage, up to 3 images) without any stated requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements; these are additional product features described in the diff summaries.
